turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can hear myself in the background. Did you remember to put on headphones or earbuds?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I am. Please, I need to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sure, what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four small pizzas with thin crust and chicken barbecue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OKay, Bella Luna is all out of chicken, would you like to choose something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, maybe veggie lover's with thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, and that's for all 4 of them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, give me a preview of the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, i have 4 small think crust pizzas and all of them to be veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Exactly. That's what I need. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, let me send that over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright you're all set. your pizzas are being made as we speak.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you very much. I appreciate your effort.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. That is all for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pick up in 40 mins.
